Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Paulina
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: Orange Line, Archer, Ashland & 35th; WB 35th, Ashland, Robinson and Archer: due to, street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 35th/Paulina.

Eastbound buses will operate via Orange Line, Archer, Ashland and 35th.

Westbound buses will operate via 35th, Ashland, Robinson and Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Morgan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Morgan. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
